name: Battle Regeneration
description:
The rage of battle seems to make you stronger as the battle gets longer.
: regenerates 1 HP per round while in combat.

name: Bluff (L1)
description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Intelligence as a modifier.

name: Bluff (L2)
description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Intelligence as a modifier.

name: Boon of the Suicide
description:
The young witch heeded the last wishes of a woman who killed herself.

This trait has no mechanical benefits.

name: Critical Strike
description: Use Dexterity for attack and damage bonuses for melee attacks.

name: Cycle Attunement
description: Some witches are attuned to one of the four seasons, and some are attuned to the yearly cycle itself. A witch attuned to the cycle has the following features: *+1 starting bonus to all stats *No starting penalties Tier II Option: +10% Physical Resistance Tier III Option: +1 HP, +1 SP Tier IV Option: +1 to all stats

name: Cycle Attunement II
description: +10% Physical Resistance Tier III Option: +1 HP, +1 SP Tier IV Option: +1 to all stats

name: Cycle Attunement III
description: +1 HP, +1 SP Tier IV Option: +1 to all stats

name: Cycle Attunement IV
description:
+1 Strength
+1 Dexterity
+1 Constitution
+1 Wisdom
+1 Intelligence
+1 Charisma

name: Diplomacy (L1)
description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Charisma as a modifier.

name: Diplomacy (L2)
description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Charisma as a modifier.

name: Disable Device (L1)
description: Chance to pick a lock or disarm a trap.

name: Disable Device (L2)
description: Chance to pick a lock or disarm a trap.

name: Double Strike
description: attacks and to hit

name: Evasion
description: possibility to avoid area of effect damage for spells that do half damage on successful reflex check.

name: Fall Attunement
description: Some witches are attuned to one of the four seasons. A witch attuned to fall has the following features: *+2 Intelligence and +2 Wisdom starting bonuses *-1 Constitution and -1 Strength starting penalties *+20% Acid Resistance and +20% Cold Resistance starting bonuses Tier II Option: Additional +20% Acid Resistance, +20% Cold Resistance Tier III Option: -1 HP, +3 SP Tier IV Option: +1 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom

name: Fall Attunement II
description: +20% Cold Resistance, +20% Acid Resistance Tier III Option: -1 HP, +3 SP Tier IV Option: +1 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom

name: Fall Attunement III
description: -1 HP, +3 SP Tier IV Option: +1 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom

name: Fall Attunement IV
description: +1 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom

name: Folk Magic
description: Spittle, root, file, and twine Poppet, knife, and flower Children's rhyme, bitter wine Meager weft of power. *Adds unique options to certain interactions *May be able to craft unique magic items (high Wisdom increases probability of success) *Can cast the exclusive spell One Wyrd Trick: Targeted enemies within 5 squares of the witch take -4 Will, -4 Reflex, -4 Fortitude, and -2 AC for three rounds. Costs 1 SP and 1 HP *Has access to the following when leveling up: Tier II Option: +1 SP Tier III Option: +2 SP. All crafting tests are successful. Tier IV Option: +1 Wisdom, +1 Charisma

name: Folk Magic II
description: +1 SP Tier III Option: +2 SP. All Practical Magic tests are successful. Tier IV Option: +1 Wisdom, +1 Charisma

name: Folk Magic III
description: +2 SP. All Practical Magic tests are successful. Tier IV Option: +1 Wisdom, +1 Charisma

name: Folk Magic IV
description: +1 Wisdom, +1 Charisma

name: Ghostpowder
description:
The adventurer briefly pursued a career as an alchemist. Some of that training stuck.

This trait allows the adventurer to use the Alchemist power Ghostpowder for a more expensive 6 SP. In battle, the adventurer throws a flask of paralysis-inducing ghostpowder at a point within 4 squares. All creatures within 1 square of the target square suffer 1 poison damage and must succeed on a DC 11 Reflex or be immobilized for two rounds.

name: Harmonic Body
description:
A good balance of humors helps protect the adventurer's body from the ravages of toxins and the elements.

The adventurer gains +10% Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Electricity, Magic, and Poison.

name: Intimidate (L1)
description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Strength as a modifier.

name: Intimidate (L2)
description: Useful in conversations for influencing others. Uses Strength as a modifier.

name: Minor Arrow of Kleos
description:
The adventurer had some training in a scholium at a young age. Some of it stuck.

This trait allows the adventurer to use the Magician power Minor Arrow of Kleos for a more expensive 5 SP. In battle, the adventurer sends forth an arrow of discordium that hits an enemy within 5 squares for 1d3+3 magical damage per every 3 character levels (no save).

name: Natural Philosophy
description: No gold but gold, no youth but youth No stone but stone, no truth but truth. Dissect and compound; distinguish, combine; Respect but compel; look and then find. *Adds unique options to certain interactions *May attempt to forage additional consumable items from plants (high Wisdom increases probability of additional items) *Can cast the exclusive spell Test the Elements: Targeted enemies within 5 squares of the witch take -50% Fire, Electricity, Acid, Cold, and Poison Resistance for three rounds. Costs 3 SP *Has access to the following when leveling up: Tier II Option: +1 SP Tier III Option: +10% Acid, Cold, Electricity, Fire, and Poison Resistance Tier IV Option: +1 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom

name: Natural Philosophy II
description: +1 SP Tier III Option: +10% Acid, Cold, Electricity, Fire, and Poison Resistance Tier IV Option: +1 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom

name: Natural Philosophy III
description: +10% Acid, Cold, Electricity, Fire, and Poison Resistance Tier IV Option: +1 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom

name: Natural Philosophy IV
description: +1 Intelligence, +1 Wisdom

name: Pick Pocket (L1)
description: Ability to try and pick the pockets of an unsuspecting target.

name: Pick Pocket (L2)
description: Ability to try and pick the pockets of an unsuspecting target.

name: Pilgrim's Orison
description:
The adventurer underwent -- and later abandoned -- religious training. Some of it stuck.

Using this trait, the adventurer can cast the Zealot spell "Pilgrim's Orison" for a more expensive 7 SP. It affects a 3x3 square on the map, healing friendly targets within for 2d4 HP for every three levels the adventurer has. Casting takes 1 turn.

name: Precise Shot (L1)
description: Gains a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons.

name: Precise Shot (L2)
description: Gains a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons.

name: Prithee Sleep, Cruel Babes!
description:
The adventurer's grandmother passed on this old folk charm before she died.

This trait allows the adventurer to cast the Witch spell Prithee Sleep, Cruel Babes! for a more expensive 5 SP. The power affects an area within 5 squares, making any enemy who fails a DC 11 Will save incapable of movement or action for 3 rounds or until injured.

name: Rapid Shot (L1)
description: Can make two ranged attacks per round on same target.

name: Rapid Shot (L2)
description: Can make two ranged attacks per round on same target.

name: Rapport
description:
Certain turns of phrase and the correct interpretation of social cues give this band of adventurers prepossessing charm.

All characters begin with Rapport, which measures what kind of impression the group as a whole makes in social situations. Rapport is determined by averaging the party's Charisma scores and using the resulting modifier instead of using an individual character's modifier to determine success on a DC 7 Charisma check. Unlike other traits that give dialog options, Rapport options only appear after a successful DC 7 Charisma check has been made.

name: Sacrifice
description: More or less, less or more, Death's a house without a door Life's a squatter, rank and poor More or less, less or more. *Knott's suffering empowers him. He can use the following ability in battle as a free action: Ripeness Is All Regains 3 SP. Costs 4 HP.

name: Sneak Attack
description: When in stealth mode, melee attacks are considered sneak attacks and do more damage (+1d6 for every 2 levels after 1st level) and have a better chance to hit (+1 to hit for every 2 levels after 1st level).

name: Spot (L1)
description: Ability to detect traps, spot signs of enemies, etc.

name: Spot (L2)
description: Ability to detect traps, spot signs of enemies, etc.

name: Spring Attunement
description: Some witches are attuned to one of the four seasons. A witch attuned to spring has the following features: *+2 Dexterity and +2 Intelligence starting bonuses *-1 Constitution and -1 Wisdom starting penalties *+20% Poison Resistance and +20% Electricity Resistance starting bonuses Tier II Option: Additional +20% Poison Resistance, +20% Electricity Resistance Tier III Option: -1 Wisdom, +1 HP, +3 SP Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Intelligence

name: Spring Attunement II
description: +20% Electricity Resistance, +20% Poison Resistance Tier III Option: -1 Wisdom, +1 HP, +3 SP Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Intelligence

name: Spring Attunement III
description: -1 Wisdom, +1 HP, +3 SP Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Intelligence

name: Spring Attunement IV
description: +1 Dexterity, +1 Intelligence

name: Springtime Blessing
description:
The young witch's attunement to spring has yielded additional benefits.

Grants +10% Physical Resistance, +10% Poison Resistance, and +2 SP.

name: Stealth (L1)
description: Ability to move undetected.

name: Stealth (L2)
description: Ability to move undetected.

name: Summer Attunement
description: Some witches are attuned to one of the four seasons. A witch attuned to summer has the following features: *+2 Strength and +2 Charisma starting bonuses *-1 Intelligence and -1 Wisdom starting penalties *+20% Fire Resistance and +20% Electricity Resistance starting bonuses Tier II Option: Additional +20% Fire Resistance, +20% Electricity Resistance Tier III Option: +3 HP Tier IV Option: +1 Strength, +1 Charisma

name: Summer Attunement II
description: +20% Electricity Resistance, +20% Fire Resistance Tier III Option: +3 HP Tier IV Option: +1 Strength, +1 Charisma

name: Summer Attunement III
description: +3 HP Tier IV Option: +1 Strength, +1 Charisma

name: Summer Attunement IV
description: +1 Charisma, +1 Strength

name: Swordplay
description: Witch and knight together lay To the hilt they played With the sun the witch arose And carried off his blade. *Begins with a sword, normally forbidden to witches. Can use powerful swords found during the game *Gets a free attack against an enemy in melee contact after destroying another enemy in melee contact *Can cast the exclusive spell Secrets of the Stolen Blade: Gain +3 Attack Bonus for three rounds. Costs 2 SP *Has access to the following when leveling up: Tier II Option: +1 Attack Bonus (Melee) Tier III Option: +1 Attack per turn Tier IV Option: +1 Strength, +1 Constitution

name: Swordplay II
description: +1 Attack Bonus (Melee) Tier III Option: +1 Attack per turn Tier IV Option: +1 Strength, +1 Constitution

name: Swordplay III
description: +1 Attack per turn Tier IV Option: +1 Strength, +1 Constitution

name: Swordplay IV
description: +1 Strength, +1 Constitution

name: Trip
description: Trip an opponent and cause him to become Prone for 2 turns.

name: Warding
description: Hereby, hereby I these defy: Hex and harm Churchman's charm Hypocrisy And evil eye. *Gains +1 AC *Gains +10% Resistance to all damage types except Physical *Can cast the exclusive spell Defy the Snake: Regains 3 HP and gains +4 AC, Fortitude, Reflex, and Will for three rounds. Costs 3 SP *Has access to the following when leveling up: Tier II Option: Additional +1 AC Tier III Option: +2 Fortitude, Reflex, Will Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Constitution

name: Warding II
description: +1 AC Tier III Option: +2 Fortitude, Reflex, Will Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Constitution

name: Warding III
description: +2 Fortitude, Reflex, Will Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Constitution

name: Warding IV
description: +1 Dexterity, +1 Constitution

name: Winter Attunement
description: Some witches are attuned to one of the four seasons. A witch attuned to winter has the following features: *+2 Wisdom and +2 Constitution starting bonuses *-1 Charisma and -1 Dexterity starting penalties *+20% Cold Resistance and +20% Magic Resistance starting bonuses Tier II Option: Additional +20% Cold Resistance, +20% Magic Resistance Tier III Option: -2 Attack Bonus, +4 SP Tier IV Option: +1 Wisdom, +1 Constitution

description: +20% Cold Resistance, +20% Magic Resistance Tier III Option: -2 Attack Bonus, +4 SP Tier IV Option: +1 Wisdom, +1 Constitution

name: Woodcraft
description: Tread the paths the black deer tread, Track the screaming fox at night. Drink the draughts of secret springs Dread no shadow in the wood. *Begins with a shortbow and arrows, normally forbidden to witches. Can use powerful archery equipment found during the game *Gets +1 Attack Bonus and +1 Damage when using any ranged weapon *Gets reduced time when using the map to travel to landmarks *Can cast the exclusive spell Of Ways and Woods: Gain +5 Dexterity for three rounds. Costs 3 SP *Has access to the following when leveling up: Tier II Option: +1 Attack Bonus (Ranged) Tier III Option: No penalty for attacking with a ranged weapon while adjacent to an enemy Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Wisdom

description: +1 Attack Bonus (Ranged) Tier III Option: No penalty for attacking with a ranged weapon while adjacent to an enemy Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Wisdom

description: No penalty for attacking with a ranged weapon while adjacent to an enemy Tier IV Option: +1 Dexterity, +1 Wisdom

name: Woodcraft IV
description: +1 Dexterity, +1 Wisdom

name: Vigorous Growth
description: "A shoot emerged, then a vine, and then came leaves and buds and orange flowers. One flower was so big it rose up and covered the sun." *Has access to the following when leveling up: Tier II Option: +1 Attack Bonus Tier III Option: +1 Strength Tier IV Option:+1 Attack per turn

name: Thick Rind
description: "His rind is thicker than yours." *Has access to the following when leveling up: Tier II Option: +2 HP Tier III Option: +2 Constitution Tier IV Option: +1 All Saves

name: Secret Seed
description: "No, no. She's dead and gone. But a witch in a grave is still a witch in a way, until the world reclaims her body completely. Knott couldn't have grown on a monk's grave." *Has access to the following when leveling up: Tier II Option: +1 SP Tier III Option: +3 Intelligence Tier IV Option: +1 Movement

name: Cleave
description: Allows to make another melee attack on a near by target upon killing their first target in that same round.

name: Point Blank Shot
description: Allows to avoid the '-4 to attack' penalty when using a ranged weapon with enemies in adjacent squares.

name: Two Attacks
description: Allows the player to make two attacks per round on same target.
